metadata.title: CVE-2015-0899 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The MultiPageValidator implementation in Apache Struts 1 1.1 through 1.3.10allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via amodified page parameter.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
